text.div:
This code system http://fhir.cqgc.ferlab.bio/CodeSystem/qc-ethnicity defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
CA-FR French CanadianDescendants of the First Nations of the St. Lawrence Valley
EU European CaucasiaAnyone from or whose ancestors originate from the European continent (excluding French Canadians).
AFR African or CarabeanPerson belonging to ethnic group with total or partial ancestry from any of the black racial groups of Africa.
LAT- AM Hispanic and Latino AmericansCanadian or Quebecois who are descendants of people from Latin America
ES-AS East and Southeast AsianCanadian or Quebecois who are descendants of people from east and southeast asia
SO-AS South AsianCanadian or Quebecois who are descendants of people from south asia
ABOR AboriginalPerson who are descendants of the natives or the indigenous peoples of the Americas
MIX Mixted descentIndividual descending from more than one ethnic group
OTH OtherOther ethnicity

Additional Language Displays

CodeFrench (fr)
CA-FRCanadien Francais
EUCaucasien Européen
AFRAfricain ou caribéen
LAT- AMHispanique
ES-ASAsiatique de l'est et du sud-est
SO-ASAsiatique du sud
ABORAmérindien
MIXOrigine mixte
OTHAutre

name: qc-ethnicity
title: Ethnicites in Quebec
description: Classification of people living in Quebec in a named category of humans sharing a common history, geographic origin or nationality. The ethnic codes used to represent these concepts are based on a list provided by the genomic sequencing center

concept.definition: Descendants of the First Nations of the St. Lawrence Valley
Anyone from or whose ancestors originate from the European continent (excluding French Canadians).
Person belonging to ethnic group with total or partial ancestry from any of the black racial groups of Africa.
Canadian or Quebecois who are descendants of people from Latin America
Canadian or Quebecois who are descendants of people from east and southeast asia

designation.value: Asiatique de l'est et du sud-est

concept.definition: Canadian or Quebecois who are descendants of people from south asia
Person who are descendants of the natives or the indigenous peoples of the Americas
Individual descending from more than one ethnic group
